import React, { useContext, useEffect } from "react"; import { IMG_URL } from "../../api/api"; // import { IMG_URL } from "../../api/api"; import useAuth from "../../auth/useAuth"; import { CartContext } from "../../layouts/Layout"; import styles from "./CartPage.module.css"; const CartPage = () => { const { cart, // setCart, addedProduct, // setAddedProduct, cartTotal, // setCartTotal, } = useContext(CartContext); const { user } = useAuth(); useEffect(() => { for (const [key, value] of Object.entries(addedProduct)) { const productId = value.product_id; let totalNum = 0; for (const [key2, value2] of Object.entries(addedProduct)) { if (value2.product_id === productId) { totalNum += 1; } } for (const [key, value] of Object.entries(addedProduct)) { const product = value; for (const [key2, value2] of Object.entries(addedProduct)) { } } const newA = addedProduct[0]; addedProduct.forEach((el) => console.log()); const filteredArray = addedProduct.filter( (product) => product.productId !== newA ); console.log(filteredArray); value.totalNum = totalNum; } console.log(addedProduct); }); return (

Checkout form

Below is an example form built entirely with Bootstrap’s form controls. Each required form group has a validation state that can be triggered by attempting to submit the form without completing it.

Carrito {cart}

    {addedProduct.map((product) => { return (
  • {product.name}
    {product.descripcion}
    ${product.price}
    • ); })} {/*
  • Product name
    Brief description
    $12
  • Second product
    Brief description
    $8
  • Third item
    Brief description
    $5
  • Promo code
    EXAMPLECODE
    -$5
    • */}
  • Total {`$${cartTotal}`}

Billing address

Valid first name is required.
Valid last name is required.
{/* */}
Your username is required.
Please enter a valid email address for shipping updates.
Please enter your shipping address.
{/*

Please provide a valid state.
Zip code required.

Name on card is required

*/} {/*

Security code required

); }; export default CartPage;
